# `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/` — Issue Templates

These templates keep Issues consistent so TL can make them executable and SWE can implement with evidence.

## What’s here

- `feature_task.md` — new feature slice (Goal/Scope/AC/Verification)
- `ops_task.md` — ops/deployment/console tasks
- `builder_task.md` — implementation task for SWE
- `verifier_task.md` — verification task (evidence + verdict)
- `explorer_task.md` — research/ambiguity reduction task
- `coordinator_task.md` — coordination/meta tasks
- `browser_task.md` — browser/console operator tasks

## Guideline

If you’re not sure which template to pick: start with `feature_task.md`.
